title: P2 large letter Speaker for sale
author: edhans

posts.post_title: P2 large letter Speaker for sale
posts.post_content: PSA5-$300.00 delivered. Check or money order only. No electronic payments. New York residents must add sales tax. As always, "I'll take it" trumps ongoing negotiations or requests for additional information. Please direct all correspondence to my email [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. Please visit my newly updated website below for a larger scan and additional cards. Thank you for looking.
